original_title: Train services on coastal line disrupted due to derailment near Kompanna Veediya
original_body_lines: The train services on the coastal line have been disrupted, owing to a derailment of a train near the Kompanna Veediya railway station, the Department of Railways said.
A slow train plying from Maradana to Panadura has reportedly derailed near the Kompanna Veediya railway station this morning (28).
